item.title: 报告称英国生活水平十年停滞不前
item.description: 一份新报告显示，2020 年代英国家庭收入将停滞不前，成为过去 60 年中生活水平最差的十年。【原文：British household incomes are set to stagnate in the 2020s, according to a new report, making it the worst decade for living standards in the past 60 years.】

item.title: 英国顶级商业领袖警告蕾切尔-里夫斯不要提高企业税
item.description: 英国最大的商业游说团体之一表示，英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）应抵制进一步提高英国公司税收的诱惑，因为这有可能扼杀经济增长。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves should resist the temptation to raise levies on UK companies further because of the risk of strangling economic growth, one of the country’s biggest business lobbies said.】

item.title: 软银支持初创公司建造巨型浮动气候站
item.description: 软银集团公司（SoftBank Group Corp. —）为一家初创公司提供了 1500 万美元的资金，这家公司正在制造巨大的子弹形氦气球，这种气球可以漂浮在平流层中。【原文：A startup building massive, bullet-shaped helium balloons that float in the stratosphere has raised $15 million from SoftBank Group Corp. — part of an effort to monitor climate data and bring connectivity to hard-to-reach areas.】

item.title: 巴西下议院否决税收法令，卢拉遭受财政打击
item.description: 巴西国会下议院投票否决了总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）提出的对部分金融交易增税的建议，这对政府支撑预算的努力造成了重大打击。【原文：Brazil’s lower house of Congress voted to block President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s proposed tax increases on some financial transactions, dealing a major blow to the government’s efforts to shore up its budget.】

item.title: 反弹暂停，亚洲股市开局谨慎：市场综述
item.description: 周四开盘时，亚洲股市可能难以找到方向，因为交易员们正在评估一触即发的经济和地缘政治风险。【原文：Asian equities may struggle for direction when trading opens on Thursday, tracking a flat session on Wall Street with traders assessing simmering economic and geopolitical risks.】

item.title: 李泽楷的 FWD 集团在香港首次公开募股中筹资 4.42 亿美元
item.description: 亿万富豪李泽楷的复地集团控股有限公司正寻求在香港首次公开募股中筹资 35 亿港元（4.42 亿美元），抓住市场热潮，最终推出四年前最初计划的股票销售。【原文：Billionaire Richard Li’s FWD Group Holdings Ltd. is seeking to raise HK$3.5 billion ($442 million) in a Hong Kong initial public offering, seizing on a hot market to finally launch a share sale initially planned four years ago.】

item.title: 欧盟就失败贷款人规则达成协议
item.description: 欧盟同意制定相关规则，以简化陷入困境的小型贷款机构的清盘程序，这也是欧盟为密切成员国银行业关系所做努力的一部分。【原文：The European Union agreed on rules to ease winding down smaller lenders in trouble, part of an effort to bring closer banking sectors of its member states.】

item.title: 中国小米将推出首款 SUV，股价接近历史最高点
item.description: 小米公司的首款电动 SUV 将于本周四亮相，这将展示这家中国科技公司如何通过在汽车市场的高风险押注成为投资者的宠儿。【原文：The unveiling of Xiaomi Corp.’s first electric SUV on Thursday will showcase how the Chinese tech company has become an investor darling with its high-stakes bet on the auto market.】

item.title: Circle K 所有者因燃料价格下降和需求减少而未达预期目标
item.description: 由于燃料需求下降，Circle K 所有者 Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.【原文：Circle K owner Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. slightly missed earnings estimates for its fiscal fourth quarter earnings because of lower fuel demand.】

item.title: 当地货币下跌，香港介入维护外汇挂钩政策
item.description: 香港事实上的中央银行周四买入本币以支撑美元，此举旨在捍卫香港货币与美元挂钩的地位。【原文：Hong Kong’s de facto central bank bought the local dollar to prop it up on Thursday, in a move to defend the city’s currency peg to the greenback.】

item.title: 博尔特的布雷斯罗又回来了，向投资者推销 6 亿美元的产品
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，一键结账公司 Bolt Financial Inc. 的首席执行官 Ryan Breslow 再次向投资者抛出新的橄榄枝— 寻求融资 6 亿美元。此前，布雷斯罗筹集资金的尝试都遇到了障碍。【原文：Ryan Breslow, the chief executive officer of one-click checkout company Bolt Financial Inc., is back with a fresh pitch to investors — seeking to raise $600 million, according to people familiar with the matter. Previous attempts by Breslow to raise cash hit roadblocks.】

item.title: 安桥公司称新建加拿大石油管道首先需要修改法律
item.description: Enbridge 公司表示，任何新的加拿大石油管道都需要修改立法，包括缩短审批时限。【原文：Enbridge Inc. said any new Canadian oil pipeline would require legislative changes, including shortened timelines for approval.】

item.title: Envision Healthcare 在扭亏为盈之际与贷款人达成债务协议
item.description: Envision Healthcare Corp.与贷款方达成一项协议，将在企业扭亏为盈的过程中降低公司的借贷成本。【原文：Envision Healthcare Corp. agreed to a deal with its lenders that will cut the company’s borrowing costs in the midst of a turnaround for the business.】

item.title: 中国 1.3 万亿美元基金巨头的野心正在减弱
item.description: 中国 1.3 万亿美元的主权财富基金多年来一直是全球最炙手可热的投资者之一。它拥有黑石集团和摩根士丹利的大量股份，与高盛集团达成交易，并向整个华尔街的基金投入了数百亿美元。【原文：China’s $1.3 trillion sovereign wealth fund spent years as one of the most sought-after investors in the world. It owned massive stakes in Blackstone Inc. and Morgan Stanley, struck deals with Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and plowed tens of billions of dollars into funds across Wall Street.】

item.title: 加州达成 3210 亿美元预算协议 助力好莱坞发展
item.description: 加利福尼亚州州长加文-纽森（Gavin Newsom）和州议员达成了一项预算协议，为好莱坞提供 7.5 亿美元的税收减免，同时缩减了无证移民的免费医疗服务。【原文：California Governor Gavin Newsom and state lawmakers struck a budget agreement that provides $750 million in tax credits for Hollywood while scaling back free health care for undocumented immigrants.】

item.title: Vista 为云软件延续基金融资 56 亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Vista Equity Partners 募集了 56 亿美元，以更长久地保留云计算软件集团（Cloud Software Group），该公司动用了自己的收购基金和新的投资者，完成了一个庞大的单一资产延续基金。【原文：Vista Equity Partners gathered $5.6 billion in order to keep Cloud Software Group for longer, tapping its own buyout funds and new investors to seal a blockbuster single-asset continuation fund, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: JBS 称美国牧场主终于开始增加牛供应量
item.description: 据顶级生产商 JBS NV 称，美国牧场主正着手扩大其牧群，以摆脱七十年来的低点，为期待已久的牛肉供应复苏铺平道路。【原文：US ranchers are moving to expand their herds from a seven-decade low, paving the way for a long-awaited recovery in beef supplies, according to top producer JBS NV.】

item.title: 马姆达尼的 "冻结租金 "计划引发与纽约市相关的房地产投资信托基金下滑
item.description: 周三，由于誓言冻结房租的州众议员佐赫兰-马姆达尼（Zohran Mamdani）看来几乎肯定会成为民主党提名的市长候选人，与纽约市房地产有关的公司股价下跌。【原文：Shares of companies linked to New York City real estate fell Wednesday as Zohran Mamdani, a state Assembly member who has vowed to freeze rents, looks all but certain to become the Democratic nominee for mayor.】

item.title: 受人工智能计算需求提振，美光发布强劲预测
item.description: 美国最大的计算机内存芯片制造商美光科技公司（Micron Technology Inc.【原文：Micron Technology Inc., the largest US maker of computer memory chips, gave an upbeat forecast for the current quarter, helped by demand for artificial intelligence equipment.】

item.title: 联合创始人称，特朗普的世界自由代币吸引了积累者的注意
item.description: 据联合创始人扎克-福克曼（Zak Folkman）称，特朗普家族下属的去中心化金融平台世界自由金融公司（World Liberty Financial Inc.【原文：World Liberty Financial Inc., the Trump family affiliated decentralized finance platform, is getting a “lot of interest” from public companies wanting to use its token as a treasury asset, according to co-founder Zak Folkman.】

item.title: 华盛顿州小城因开发商纠纷罕见申请破产
item.description: 华盛顿州的一个小城市因未能与开发商就 2,600 万美元的法院判决达成协议，申请了罕见的市政破产。【原文：A small city in Washington State filed a rare municipal bankruptcy after failing to reach an agreement with a developer over a $26 million court judgment.】

item.title: 如果 "欧佩克+"认为有必要，俄罗斯对提高产量持开放态度
item.description: 据一位熟悉俄罗斯立场的人士透露，如果欧佩克+认为有必要增产，俄罗斯愿意在下一次欧佩克+会议上再次增产。【原文：Russia is open to another output hike at the next OPEC+ meeting if the alliance deems such an increase to be necessary, according to a person familiar with the nation’s position.】

item.title: 美联储发布放宽关键银行资本规则的计划
item.description: 美联储公布了撤销一项重要资本规则的计划，大银行称这项规则限制了它们持有更多国债和在 29 万亿美元的市场中充当中介的能力。【原文：The Federal Reserve unveiled plans to roll back an important capital rule that big banks have said limits their ability to hold more Treasuries and act as intermediaries in the $29 trillion market.】

item.title: 马姆达尼震撼获胜令华尔街担忧 "共匪之夏
item.description: 即使是诋毁佐赫兰-马姆达尼的人也认识到，这位 33 岁的民主社会主义者的气场是强大的。【原文：Even Zohran Mamdani’s detractors recognize that the vibes are with the 33-year-old democratic socialist.】

item.title: 世界还能指望 "TACO "吗？
item.description:
在本期特朗普经济学节目中，我们将探讨唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对伊朗的攻击是否改变了其 "对等 "关税的计算方法以及迫在眉睫的最后期限。【原文：

In this episode of Trumponomics, we explore whether Donald Trump’s attack on Iran changes the calculus on his “reciprocal” tariffs and a looming deadline.

】

item.title: 人工智能消费势头不减，英伟达股价再创新高
item.description: 周三，英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）股价升至历史新高，这家人工智能芯片领域的领军企业延续了此前的上涨势头，巩固了其作为全球最有价值公司之一的地位。【原文：Nvidia Corp. shares rose to an all-time high on Wednesday, with the leader in artificial intelligence chips extending an advance that has cemented its position as one of the most valuable companies in the world.】

item.title: 以色列中央银行行长称伊朗战争有助于以色列的长期前景
item.description: 以色列中央银行行长阿米尔-亚龙（Amir Yaron）表示，以色列为遏制其军事和核计划而对伊朗发动的战争将促进该国的长期经济前景。【原文：Israel’s war on Iran to curb its military and nuclear program will boost the country’s long-term economic prospects, according to Central Bank Governor Amir Yaron.】

item.title: 道富私人信贷 ETF 流入荒终于结束
item.description: 经过几个月的停滞不前，State Street Corp. 终于看到投资者对该公司首创的私人信贷 ETF 产生了一些兴趣。【原文：After months of standstill, State Street Corp. is finally seeing some interest among investors in the firm’s first-of-its-kind private credit ETF.】

item.title: Terra Quantum 首席执行官与投资者 Lakestar 在筹资谈判中发生争执
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，随着这家瑞士量子计算初创公司寻求新一轮融资，Terra Quantum AG 首席执行官马库斯-普弗利施（Markus Pflitsch）与投资者 Lakestar Capital Partners 的关系正在恶化。【原文：Terra Quantum AG Chief Executive Officer Markus Pflitsch’s relationship with investor Lakestar Capital Partners is deteriorating as the Swiss quantum computing startup seeks a fresh round of funding, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 萨克斯正在商谈从债券持有人处获得 6 亿美元的新债务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，萨克斯全球企业正在与债券持有人商谈向他们借入新债的事宜，这笔交易将提供高达约 6 亿美元的新融资。【原文：Saks Global Enterprises is in talks with bondholders about borrowing fresh debt from them in a deal that would supply up to about $600 million in new financing, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】
